Name: W.H.A.L.E.
About the game: A water analysis laboratory created for the University of Sassari, Faculty of Agriculture, in collaboration with the European Union, 'Master in Agricultural and HYDrological Approaches to a better sustainable development'. In the chemistry lab you will be able to perform water analyzes that are normally carried out in real chemistry laboratories in the city of Sassari, you will be able to make different liquids interact with each other and have the opportunity to learn how to perform the analysis of the different samples according to need. This game is only for people who study the HYDrological Approaches to a better sustainable development.
